HTMLElementPlaintext.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The <plaintext> HTML element renders everything following the start tag as raw text, ignoring any following HTML. There is no closing tag, since everything after it is considered raw text.

blockquote.para: Warning: Do not use this element.

remarks.para:
-The pre and code elements, which should be used instead.
-The xmp element, also obsolete, similar to plaintext.
